reason.tex: %text \textbf{Odd functions } If $f(-x) = -f(x)$, then $f(x)$ is an odd function. For odd functions \[ \qquad \underbrace{\int_{-a}^a f(x)\cdot dx = 0}_{\text{Example: }f(x) = \sin x} \] \textbf{Even functions } If $f(-x) = f(x)$, then $f(x)$ is an even function. For even functions \[ \qquad \underbrace{\int_{-a}^a f(x)\cdot dx = 2\int_0^a f(x)\cdot dx}_{\text{Example: }f(x) = \cos x}\] %
